attributes.action: Council/housing associations allow tenants to be housed with their pets.
attributes.additional_details: Mental health is a big thing. Our dogs are like our children and help towards stress, anxiety and depression. Having to give up a pet is like asking us to give up a child!
attributes.background: When being classed as homeless or needing a home our pets should be able to be housed with us.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual councils and associations.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
